channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Media Obsessed With Trashing National Abortion Limit Unfazed By Harris’ Pledge To Nuke Filibuster
item.description: Nuking the filibuster would effectively strip the upper congressional chamber of its unique minority power protections.

item.title: Trump blames Harris amid data showing tens of thousands criminal migrants in US: 'Deliberately erased' border

item.title: For Plan Sponsors: Understanding Investment Vehicles and Fees
item.description: Plan sponsors would be wise to focus on investment vehicle choice and fee structure. Share class choice impacts fees and investment performance.

item.title: White House mum amid outrage over data showing how many illegal immigrant criminals are free in US
item.description: The White House did not immediately comment on data showing the number of noncitizen convicted criminals who are not detained in ICE custody.

item.title: Supreme Court refuses RFK Jr.'s request to be on New York's ballot
item.description: The Supreme Court on Friday refused Robert F. Kennedy Jr.'s request to be put on New York's presidential ballot.

item.title: Washington Post’s Incurious Philip Bump Says The Media Should Just Give Kamala The ‘Benefit Of The Doubt’
item.description: Bump is ready to quickly move on from any issue that could be a problem for the political party he's trying to help win this election.

item.title: The Real Three Mile Island Disaster Was Shutting It Down
item.description: The unjustly maligned nuclear plant might soon be up and running again as America’s misguided war against nuclear power de-escalates.

item.title: Recent hurricanes have caused over $200 billion in damage
item.description: The most recent major hurricanes to hit the U.S. left hundreds of people dead and caused billions of dollars worth of damage.

item.title: Experts warn EV owners of fire risk from Hurricane Helene
item.description: Keeping electric vehicles out of standing water is the best way to avoid the possibility of a fire.

item.title: We Must Break the Cycle of Pandering
item.description: Voters deserve major-party candidates who treat them like grown-ups, telling them the truth rather than what they want to hear.

item.title: Fly to Europe from the U.S. for less than $100—but you’ll have to act fast

item.description: A New York appellate court is raising questions regarding the penalty and the justification under which AG Letitia James brought the case.

item.title: U.S. stock market ends week higher despite the chill; Asia rallies on stimulus
